entry.title: 3M - 17" Floor Buffer Pad Red 5100 - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Misc
Price: 8.99 - 45.99 (2 variants)

Details
  • Can be used for everyday cleaning under an automatic scrubber
  • Also designed for spray buffing
  • Cleans when damp, buffs when dry
  • Smooth operation extends pad life and may help reduce operator fatigue

Specially designed for spray buffing. Cleans when damp, buffs when dry. Quickly cleans and removes scuff marks and enhances floor appearance. Works great on automatic floor scrubbers for light-duty cleaning.

Product Type
Cleaning Pads
Recommended Application
Spray Cleaning Protected Floors
Recommended Surfaces
Concrete, Industrial Floors, VCT
Shape
Round

entry.title: 3M - 20" Floor Cleaner Pad Blue 5300 - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Misc
Price: 12.99 - 59.99 (2 variants)

Details
  • Made of nylon and polyester fibres in an open textured non-woven construction
  • Abrasive particles are dispersed throughout and bonded to the non-woven construction with a durable adhesive

Use the 3M™ Blue Cleaner Pad for heavy-duty scrubbing prior to recoating, as well as heavy-duty spray cleaning or foam scrubbing. Removes dirt, spills and scuffs, leaving a clean surface ready for recoating.

Product Type
Cleaning Pads
Recommended Application
Scrubbing Unprotected Floors, Spray Cleaning Unprotected Floors
Recommended Surfaces
Concrete, Industrial Floors, VCT
Shape
Round
Surface Type
Linoleum, Sheet Vinyl, VCT

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Misc
Price: 10.99 - 49.99 (2 variants)

Details
  • Use with water-based floor finish stripping solutions to remove old, soiled floor finishes and sealers
  • Made of nylon and polyester fibres in an open textured non-woven construction
  • Abrasive particles are dispersed throughout and bonded to the non-woven construction with a durable adhesive

The industry standard floor pad. The 3M™ Black Stripper Pad offers consistent and proven performance with a long life. It is the industry standard floor pad as it maintains consistent, high performance throughout the life of the pad.

entry.title: 3M - 20" High Productivity Floor Stripper Pad Black 7300 - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Misc
Price: 15.99 - 74.99 (2 variants)

  • Details
    • Our most aggressive stripping pad
    • Made of continuous filament nylon in an open textured non-woven construction
    • For fast removal of finish and consistent stripping

    3M™ High Productivity Pad, 7300 is a floor maintenance stripping pad quickly and thoroughly removes old floor finish, dirt and build-up. It is made of continuous filament nylon in an open-web construction, which allows the stripping solution to flow trough the pad to rinse out dirt and reduce loading for increased pad-to-floor contact and efficient stripping. Abrasive particles are dispersed throughout and bonded to the non-woven construction with a durable resin system that permeates the entire pad. These pads are constructed to be durable and offer consistent performance.

    Suggested Applications

    • For use on standard, low-speed, automatic scrubbers and rotary floor machines (175-600 rpm)
    • Product Type
      Stripping Pads
      Recommended Application
      Aggressive Stripping
      Recommended Surfaces
      Concrete, Industrial Floors
      Shape
      Round
      Surface Type
      Resilient

entry.title: 3M - 17" Floor Super Polish Pad White 4100- Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Misc
Price: 9.99 - 46.99 (2 variants)

Details
  • Can be used to polish wood floors, spray cleaning or dry buffing soft finishes (using a rotary machine)
  • Made of polyester fibres in an open textured non-woven construction

3M™ White Super Polish Pad, 4100 is ideal for buffing very soft finishes or for polishing soft waxes on wood floors. It removes scuffs and black heel marks and enhances floor appearance.

Product Colour
White
Recommended Application
Polishing
Recommended Surfaces
Ceramic, Linoleum, Marble, Plastic, Vinyl, Wood
Shape
Round
Size
17 Inch
Surface Type
Linoleum, Sheet Vinyl, VCT
